set.name: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may shuffle all cards in your opponent's graveyard and put them on the bottom of their owner's deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks you, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put one on the bottom of your deck. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 4 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is jokers, you may discard a jokers. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, jokers tornado up to 2 times. If you do, you may choose a spell from your hand or graveyard that costs the same as or less than the total cost of the Jokers returned to your hand and cast it for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead. {JOKERS TORNADO} Return one of your other Jokers to your hand

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be attacked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may jokers tornado. If you do, use one of the jokers tornadoed creature's abilities that starts with "When you put this creature into the battle zone". {JOKERS TORNADO} Return one of your other Jokers to your hand

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack on the turn they are put into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 6 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 6 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is jokers, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 7 or less and put it on the bottom of their deck. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 2 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 2 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is jokers, put a jokers from your graveyard into your mana zone. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player draws a card. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may choose a creature and untap it. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSP-04 DueMa Strong Dream: Jokers GR Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may jokers tornado. If you do, until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't put a card that costs the same as that jokers tornadoed creature into the battle zone. {JOKERS TORNADO} Return one of your other Jokers to your hand (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)
